rules.name: P1 Issues - Initial Alert
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND priority = P1 AND status != Done
rules.description: First escalation for P1 issues that haven't moved status in 30 minutes

escalation_paths.message_template: ‚ö†Ô∏è This P1 issue has been in {status} status for more than {time_in_status_minutes:.0f} minutes. Please update the status or add a comment.
‚ö†Ô∏è *Initial Alert*: P1 issue {issue_key} ({issue_summary}) has been in {status} for {time_in_status_minutes:.0f} minutes!

rules.name: P1 Issues - Day 1 Escalation
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND priority = P1 AND status != Done
rules.description: Second escalation for P1 issues, active after 1 day

escalation_paths.message_template: üîî **Manager Alert**: This P1 issue has been in {status} status for more than 1 day. Please ensure this is being worked on.
üîî ALERT: P1 issue {issue_key} ({issue_summary}) has been in {status} for more than 1 day!

rules.name: P1 Issues - Day 2 Escalation
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND priority = P1 AND status != Done
rules.description: Third escalation for P1 issues, active after 2 days

escalation_paths.message_template: üö® **Director Alert**: P1 issue {issue_key} has been stuck for 2+ days. This requires immediate attention.
üö® URGENT: P1 issue {issue_key} ({issue_summary}) has been in {status} for more than 2 days without resolution.

rules.name: P1 Issues - Day 3 Escalation
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND priority = P1 AND status != Done
rules.description: Final escalation for P1 issues, active after 3 days

escalation_paths.message_template: üî• CRITICAL ALERT: P1 issue {issue_key} ({issue_summary}) has been in {status} for MORE THAN 3 DAYS without resolution. This requires IMMEDIATE executive attention.

rules.name: Blocked Issues - Initial Alert
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND status = Blocked AND assignee IS NOT EMPTY
rules.description: First escalation for issues blocked for more than 2 hours

escalation_paths.message_template: This issue has been blocked for more than 2 hours. Please update the status or add information about the blocker.

rules.name: Blocked Issues - Day 1 Escalation
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND status = Blocked AND assignee IS NOT EMPTY
rules.description: Second escalation for issues blocked for more than 1 day

escalation_paths.message_template: This issue has been blocked for more than 24 hours. Management attention is required.

rules.name: Unassigned Issues - Initial Alert
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND assignee IS EMPTY AND status = 'To Do'
rules.description: First escalation for unassigned issues that have been in To Do for more than 4 hours

escalation_paths.message_template: This issue has been unassigned in To Do status for more than 4 hours. Please assign it to someone.

rules.name: Unassigned Issues - Day 1 Escalation
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND assignee IS EMPTY AND status = 'To Do'
rules.description: Second escalation for unassigned issues after 1 day

escalation_paths.message_template: Issue {issue_key} has been unassigned in To Do status for more than 24 hours. Please prioritize assignment.
